alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pine, southwestern Bayfield, southern Douglas, Washburn, southwestern Ashland, northern Price, northeastern Burnett and Sawyer Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Namekagon Lake, to near Webster, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clam Lake around 520 PM CDT. Hertel around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Spooner, Park Falls, Shell Lake, Fifield and Butternut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
